glsa.title: libexif: Integer overflow vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: libexif fails to handle Exif (EXchangeable Image File) data inputs, making it vulnerable to an integer overflow.

background.p: libexif is a library for parsing, editing and saving Exif data.

description.p: Victor Stinner reported an integer overflow in the exif_data_load_data_entry() function from file exif-data.c while handling Exif data.

impact.p: An attacker could entice a user to process a file with specially crafted Exif extensions with an application making use of libexif, which will trigger the integer overflow and potentially execute arbitrary code or crash the application.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.

resolution.p: All libexif users should upgrade to the latest version. Please note that users upgrading from "<=media-libs/libexif-0.6.13" should also run revdep-rebuild after their upgrade.
